Blog.post: I'm so tired of being here Suppressed by all my childish fears And if you have to leave I wish that you would just leave 'Cause your presence still lingers here And it won't leave me alone These wounds won't seem to heal This pain is just too real There's just too much that time cannot erase [CHORUS:] When you cried I'd wipe away all of your tears When you'd scream I'd fight away all of your fears I held your hand through all of these years But you still have All of me You used to captivate me By your resonating life Now I'm bound by the life you left behind Your face it haunts My once pleasant dreams Your voice it chased away All the sanity in me These wounds won't seem to heal This pain is just too real There's just too much that time cannot erase [Chorus] I've tried so hard to tell myself that you're gone But though you're still with me I've been alone all along [Chorus]

hey yall omg last night was so0o crazy.. i dont even know where to begin.. but everyone was turning against me cause i was trying to get stuff straight and kel started to go off on me about talking to adam!! omg lets be gay! but i dont even know what i did for her not to like me so much.. but oh well crap happens!! and rowdy called me a whore again.. so i think i lost him again.. but.. gahh.. i will be ready when i go to the coast to get away from all these people!! and nic is talking to me again!! yay!! but i gots to go bye bye *amanda*

omg!! yesterday was so0o much funn me and hope went to louisville and we met alot of guys they just came up out of no where and asked for our numbers and we have been texting them.. and they are so0o sweet and awesome... omg i wish i lived down there so0o bad!! ahh!! hey hope me and u still got it!!! haha! they even text us when we are asleep.. and hope did it hurt!?!?! haha well i gots to go bye bye *amanda*

heyy yall yesterday was very exciting lol me and hope went to the animal rescue to work with her mom cause i have to have community service.. well we had to clean out all the cages and i busted my butt in dog crap.. lol.. then we worked all day then we went swimming and i got burnt!! ahh.. then hopes brother hurt his hand i swear that boy cant do nothing without hurting himself.. and today kirby and rowdy just came over and rowdy is mad at me AGAIN i swear! and he left his shoes at my house last time he left his phone! he is crazy.. but gah he gets mad at me over every lil thing and i dont understand!! but i gots to go bye bye*amanda*

hey guys! well today i felt like this past weekend when i almost died!! i got to hot lucky my best friend in the whole world was there to help me! i love u so much girl and thanks for helping me they put ice on my back and legs and i didnt feel NOTHING!! it was crazy.. but omg about rowdy i love him with all my heart but he gets mad at me alot and i mean he is like my best friend... and iono what to do about him.. my life is all confusing right now!

hey.. sometimes do u ever wonder why the fuck people talk about u when they really dont give a shit about u or what u do they just want to try to make ur life a livin hell yeah that is what is fucking gay.. people dont know shit about u or ur life.. but they want to make bull shit comments anyway.. so if u only have a couple of true friends why should u care about what anyone else thinks or does.. people are so fucked up these days.. they cant stop and think about what is really goin on in their life.. but they have to be in someone elses.. if u hate someone so much then why do u talk about them.. or do shit that reminds u of them.. why should u really care.. sometimes i just wanna give up everything and not worry about all this shit anymore.. but i realized that that will be stupid and selfish.. and people need to learn that people CAN change.. but their heads are so far up there ass or their b/f's to realize that!!

heyy me and hope and christina and hayden and my cuz went to the movies sat. night and we saw spider man 2 lol..colby was there i havent see him since he moved to texas! he got taller!haha then we went to wendys and i saw a bunch of people like adam and derek and cary and ronnie and matt burge and charlie and baker.. and then i went inside and saw a bunch of people from my school and mike shaw! but anyways im about to take lil kids to the zoo!

bryan is leaving... he got kicked out of his house and now he is moving to tenn. to live with his dad! maybe it was for the better but im still ganna miss him cuase he was my first love and he actually made me feel like a person.. he was awesome but i think he will be happier there than he was here i know i would be! but anyways im going to talk to him before he leaves!

heyy.. me and hope are about to go to the coast for like two weeks!! im so excited.. even thoe my mom is wanting me out of the house that is the whole reason im going! but i get to hang out with my cousins and go to his beach parties so i aint complaining!! but im about to leave bye bye

if they have to comment on my blog and sign anonymous instead of coming to my face and sayin it then that is what is gay.. i dont care if people comment on my blog i really dont give a shit what people think about me.. yeah i used to but now i dont give a damn cause it isnt affecting me.. if someone hates someone so0o much and think their blog is so gay why the fuck do u read it stupid ass people!! its not that hard to stay out of someones life that they hate!! but i dont really care do whatever the fuck u want your just wasting ur time making comments about someone u hate

Usher Confessions (Interlude) [Usher talking on phone]Hello? Yo I'm in the booth I'mma call you right back Nah I just gotta put this one part down I'mma call you back I'm at the studio man what--Man quit playin' with me man No for real don't play like that Are you--are you serious? How you know? Put that on everything. DamnI'mma call u back I'mma call u back... [Intro]Everytime I was in L.A. I was with my ex-girlfriend Everytime you called I told you, "Baby I'm workin." (No!) I was out doin my dirt (Oh!) Wasn't thinkin' 'bout you gettin' hurt(I) was hand in hand in the Beverly Center like man Not givin' a damn who sees me So gone (I know)So wrong (Just listen) Thinkin' I got it and left you sittin' at home Thinkin' about me Bein' a good girl that you are But you prolly believe you got a good man I man that never would do the things I'm about to tell you I've done Brace yourself It ain't good But it would be even worse if you heard this from somebody else (oh no) [Usher speaking]I know you hate me I know I hurt you But there's more listen... Watch this... [Chorus:] These are my confessions Just when I thought I said all I can say My chick on the side said she got one on the way These are my confessions Man I'm thrown and I dont know what to do I guess I gotta give part 2 of my confessions If I'm gonna tell it then I gotta tell it all Damn near cried when I got that phone call I'm so throwed and I don't know what to do But to give you part 2 of my confessions [Verse 1] Now this gon' be the hardest thing I think I ever had to do Got me talkin' to myself askin' how I'm gon' tell you' bout that chick on part 1 I told ya'll I was creepin' with, creepin' with Said she's 3 months pregnant and she's keepin' it The first thing that came to mind was you Second thing was how do I know if it's mine and is it true Third thing was me wishin' that I never did what I did [Chorus] [Verse 2] Sittin here stuck on stupid, tryna figure out When, what, and how I'mma let this come out of my mouth Said it ain't gon' be easy But I need to stop thinkin', contemplatin'Be a man and get it over with (over with) I'm ridin' in my whip Racin' to her place Talkin' to myself Preparin' to tell her to her face She open up the door and didn't want to come near me I said "one second baby please hear me" [Chorus] [Breakdown] This by far is the hardest thing I think I've ever had to do To tell you, the woman I love That I'm having a baby by a woman that I barely even know I hope you can accept the fact that I'm man enough to tell you this And hopefully you'll give me another chance This ain't about my career This ain't about my life It's about us Please [Chorus]

heyy well today SUCKED!! my dad wanted to do a family outing and no one gets along on those things! so i went off on my dad.. and my mom is sending me to the coast for 2 weeks cause she dont want me around the house.. she is going crazy.. the other day she just told me to get out.. iono whats wrong with her.. but i guess she will be iight when i come back.. but my great aunt is out of the hospital im so0o happy cause i thought she might die and she is like my second grandmother on my moms side! she is who i stay with when i go to the coast.. but im kinda glad im going to the coast cuase i get to see my friend's family.. the one that got rapped and killed.. it will be sad but i need to go visit them!!

hateful hearts, abusive hands someones spirt is torn apart a pretty face, a perfect place only she knows what it takes a beautiful dove, a smile full of love all she needs is a friendly hug bleeding tears, a hurting soul she's all alone freezing in the cold bright lights, painful needles only ONE person stands there with her as she lies in the hospital brusies,cuts, a few broken ribs but not as painful as the heart she fears. *amanda*
